function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contractual issues such as late payments, material breach of contract, repudiation, delay damages, risk allocation","Impact":"Potential closure of construction sites, delayed projects, reduced staff due to furlough scheme, increased risk of insolvency and termination of contracts","Mitigation":"Implement clear communication protocols, flexible contract terms, and alternative payment arrangements","Technologies":"Contract management software, project management tools, and digital payment systems","People":"Contractors, subcontractors, and construction workers","Owner":"Project managers, legal teams, and industry regulators"},{"Description":"Unprecedented economic recession triggered by the coronavirus crisis","Impact":"Significant implications for UK's public and private finance, GDP fall, job losses, negative impact on productivity and output, increased likelihood of insolvency and repudiation","Mitigation":"Implement economic stimulus measures, financial support programs, and flexible funding arrangements","Technologies":"Economic forecasting tools, financial modeling software, and digital banking platforms","People":"Business owners, finance professionals, and government policymakers","Owner":"Government agencies, financial institutions, and industry associations"},{"Description":"Decreased productivity and output in the UK construction industry","Impact":"30% drop in productivity, material shortages, fewer workers, increased risk of insolvency and contract termination","Mitigation":"Invest in technology and automation, streamline supply chain processes, and implement remote work solutions","Technologies":"Construction management software, supply chain optimization tools, and remote collaboration platforms","People":"Construction workers, project managers, and supply chain stakeholders","Owner":"Construction companies, technology providers, and industry organizations"}]}
